select b.* from( select a.*, row_number() over (order by a.asr_cd desc) rnum from( SELECT asrent.asr_cd, asset.as_se, asset.as_cd, asrent.asr_date, asrent.asr_starttime, asrent.asr_endtime, asrent.asr_reason, asrent.emp_no, asset.as_name ,emp_name||'('||asrent.emp_no||')/'||dept_name as fullname FROM asrent INNER JOIN asset on asrent.as_cd = asset.as_cd INNER JOIN emp on asrent.emp_no = emp.emp_no inner join dept on emp.dept_cd = dept.dept_cd
ORDER By asr_date desc )a )b
where b.rnum >= #{startRow} and b.rnum <= #{endRow} ORDER By asr_date desc
